Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable



I think I can help on the Queen Mary stuff. The late Peter James actually=

became well-known because he facilitated the production of the audible
voi=
ce of the little girl known to him (and the rest of the world) as "Jackie."=

This recording, not an EVP, became for many clear evidence that the 
littl=
e girl was quite real. Many people, including some known personally
to me, =
claim to have seen this little girl and others in the First Class Pool
area=
. This story goes back many years before Disney had anything to do
with the=
 Queen Mary, so I think it is correct to say that myth is wrong.


=C2=A0

=
________________________________
=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 Date: Wed Apr 21, 2010 =
12:50 pm ((PDT))

=C2=A0 Yeah, that was from me(Frank). Yeah that helps, at=
 least you're not just
some brainiac debunker that knows it all cuz he says=
 so.

Anyway, I find it very difficult to get absolutes with this work, as =
the
mind has a hell of lot to do with it. An example, I started out using a=

randiom voltage to sweep the radios becuase I was using EVPmaker previous =
to
making boxes, and EVPmaker uses a method of chopping up the raw audio, a=
nd
playing it back for use by the enities. When I first swtiched to a linea=
r
sweep all I couyld hear was gibberish, then very suddenly I hear hear "th=
em"
talking on my fisrt linear sweep box. So did it take "them" time to ada=
pt,
or did it take my brain to make sense out of the gibberish.

For me, I =
don't care which it is, I think it's valid either way. If it is
only the mi=
nd creating the messages you hear, which I doubt because others
can hear al=
ot of this stuff, then I think it's still being used as a psychic
prop and =
the information is valid.

Then there's the probelm of expectations, if you=
 test this stuff in a lab,
I think you'll limit your results, and get whate=
ver is expected. If you'r
expecting evidence of a haunting, that's what you=
 get. I was on the Queen
mary last fall, in the pool area there is supposed=
ly a littlegirl stuck
there and you can get all the EVPs, and=C2=A0 EMF rea=
dings and interactions to
verify it, but that story (I heard) was started b=
y Disney to bring in
tourists. There were some that claimed to "corss over"=
 hundreds of souls on
the QM, so why is the QM still haunted?=C2=A0 I don't=
 go the "haunted areas" to
record.

I get voices like this, which seem to b=
e pretty much ignored if it doesn't
fit the ghost hunter expectation, but i=
t shows how broadcast fragment are
manipulated.

It's not all cut and dried=
, and can be vary complicated.

Frank-S

On Wed, Apr 21, 2010 at 12:34 PM, =
John S <phenom_investigator@...>wrote:

>
>
>=C2=A0 I don't know if F=
rank's question regarding experience was to myself or to
> Dwayne.
>
> In c=
ase it was to me, here is a brief summary of my work.
>
>
>
> I have been i=
nvolved with Parapsychology research for about 4 decades.
>
> During that t=
ime I have conducted experiments in ESP and PK including some
>
> groundbre=
aking research on real-time PK and remote PK studies with gifted
> subjects=
.
>
> I have also conducted quite a bit of research on mediumship, theories=
 of
> survival,
>
> EVP as a matter of fact and the belief systems which se=
em to contribute to
> all of this.
>
> The Ouija work was an outgrowth of t=
he PK research involving several test
> groups.
>
>
>
> While I don't argue=
 for a specific interpretation of any ability or
> phenomenon,
>
> I do thi=
nk it's important to offer what is known from Parapsychology lab
> research=
.
>
> This is far from any form of 'debunking per se. Rather it is an attem=
pt
>
> to offer an explanation grounded at least in some careful studies.
>=

> That explanation is still anomalous; it is not something that would make=

>
> a skeptic very happy. But it is at least based on repeated tests which=
 seem
>
>
> to show outcomes consistent with predictions -=C2=A0 the basis =
of experimental
> technique.
>
>
>
> Hope that helps clarify things a bit.
=
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>=C2=A0
